author: Simon Difford
description: Most recipes for this cocktail are merely Pimm's and champagne, but this mix is disappointing and a waste of champagne. Orange curaçao adds some much needed fruitiness, but even then, there are better cocktails and better ways to drink both Pimm's and champagne.
name: Pimm's Royale
recipeIngredient: 120 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: POUR Pimm's and orange curaçao into chilled glass and TOP with chilled champagne
